presentationTable.name: Facts - Job Application Events
presentationTable.description: A folder containing measures related to various events of the job application

presentationColumns.name: Total Job Applications (on Event)
presentationColumns.description: Number of distinct job applications across all phases and states at the time of the application event
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Total Job Applications (on Event)

presentationColumns.name: Job Applications Rejected
presentationColumns.description: Number of applications rejected by the employer
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Job Applications Rejected

presentationColumns.name: Job Applications Withdrawn
presentationColumns.description: Number of Applications withdrawn by the applicant
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Job Applications Withdrawn

presentationColumns.description: Number of Job Applications in Offer Phase that are moved to Draft State

localization.localizationKey: Number of Job Applications in Offer Phase moved to Draft State

presentationColumns.name: New Hires
presentationColumns.description: Number of candidates that have been hired for the first time in the organization.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.New Hires

presentationColumns.name: Employee Hires
presentationColumns.description: Number of hires that are already employees in the organization with a different job
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Employee Hires

presentationColumns.name: Contingent Worker Hires
presentationColumns.description: Number of hires that are already contingent workers in the organization with a different job
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Contingent Worker Hires

presentationColumns.name: Hires
presentationColumns.description: Total Hires
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Hires

presentationColumns.name: Internal Hires
presentationColumns.description: Number of hires that already have an active work relationship in the organization
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Internal Hires

presentationColumns.name: External Hires
presentationColumns.description: Number of hires that were external candidates
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.External Hires

presentationColumns.name: Referral Hires
presentationColumns.description: Number of hires that were referral candidates
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Referral Hires

presentationColumns.name: Number of Referred Applications
presentationColumns.description: Number of job applications that came as referrals
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Number of Referred Applications

presentationColumns.name: Total Requisitions with Applicants
presentationColumns.description: Number of job requisitions that have applicants on them
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Total Requisitions with Applicants

presentationColumns.name: Requisitions with no Internal Applicants
presentationColumns.description: Number of job requisitions that do not have any internal applicants on them
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Requisitions with no Internal Applicants

presentationColumns.name: Hire Rate
presentationColumns.description: The percentage of Candidates that have been hired including internal and external Candidates based on the job application.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Hire Rate

presentationColumns.name: External Hire Rate
presentationColumns.description: The percentage of external Candidates that have been hired
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.External Hire Rate

presentationColumns.name: Internal Hire Rate
presentationColumns.description: The percentage of internal Candidates that have been hired
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Internal Hire Rate

presentationColumns.name: Job Applications - Offer Acceptance Rate
presentationColumns.description: Job Offers accepted as a percentage of offers extended
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Job Applications - Offer Acceptance Rate

presentationColumns.name: Referral Hire Rate
presentationColumns.description: The percentage of referral Candidates  that have been hired
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Referral Hire Rate

presentationColumns.name: Referral Success Rate
presentationColumns.description: The percentage of Candidate referrals that resulted as hires.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Referral Success Rate

presentationColumns.name: Rehires
presentationColumns.description: Number of hires where the candidate was an ex-worker of the organization
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Rehires

presentationColumns.name: Rehire Rate
presentationColumns.description: Number of rehires as a percentage of total hires
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Rehire Rate

presentationColumns.name: Drop Off Rate
presentationColumns.description: Percentage of applications that were either withdrawn or rejected out of the total applications
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Application Event.Drop Off Rate

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions with no Internal Applicant Percentage
presentationColumns.description: Percentage of job requisitions that have no internal applicants

presentationColumns.description: Percentage of candidates that moved to HR phase of the total offers extended

presentationColumns.description: Percentage of offers extended against total job openings

presentationColumns.description: Percentage of hires against total job openings
